AI Image Generator

Generate images from text prompts using AI models (SD-Turbo, Janus-Pro-1B) directly in your browser with WebGPU acceleration.

Generated image will appear here

FAQ

What models are supported?

SD-Turbo (512√ó512 with seed support) and Janus-Pro-1B (WebGPU-only) are supported. Models are downloaded on first use and cached locally.

Do I need WebGPU?

Yes, WebGPU is required. Use Chrome/Edge 113+, Safari Technology Preview, or Firefox Nightly with WebGPU enabled. The tool will check for WebGPU support on load.

How long does generation take?

Generation time varies by model and hardware. SD-Turbo typically takes 10-30 seconds on modern GPUs. Janus-Pro-1B may take longer.

Can I use seeds for reproducible results?

Yes, SD-Turbo supports seeds for deterministic generation. Enter a number in the seed field. Janus-Pro-1B does not support seeds.

Is my data sent to a server?

No. All processing happens locally in your browser. Models are downloaded once and cached in browser storage.
